modName: All the Perks - Separate txt Files
summary: I needed a mod to add all the perks of only one or two skill trees. Not all at once. I figured I might not be alone in that.
descriptionHtml:
[b]-Introduction-[/b]
I needed a mod to add all the perks of only one or two skill trees. Not all at once. I figured I might not be alone in that.

[b]-Usage-
[/b]To use the files, open the console and and type, "bat (Name of file)". Example, "bat twohanded", without the quotation marks.
For the case of the "werewolf" and "vampire" files, use them when in either werewolf or vampire form respectfully.

[u]These t[u]xt files will not give you levels or perk points to spend. They[u][u] only adds all the perks of [u][u]one skill tree at a time.[/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u]

[b]-Installation-
[/b]Just drop all the files into the main skyrim directory. [u]NOT THE DATA FOLDER[/u].

[b]-Download-
[/b]The main file include everything EXCEPT the "vampire", aka vampire lord, file.
If you have Dawngaurd then download the optional "Vampire Lord Perks" file.
author: Lusker

files.name: All the Perks - Separate txt Files
